text:
viSvacar.ShaNE || 
miqtrasya# car.ShaNIqdhRutaqH SravO# dEqvasya# sAnaqsiM | 
saqtyaM ciqtra Sra#vastamaM ||
miqtrO janAn# yAtayati prajAqnan miqtrO dA#dhAra pRuthiqvImuqta dyAM | 
miqtraH kRuqShTIrani#miShAq&Bi ca#ShTE saqtyAya# haqvyaM GRuqtava#d-vidhEma || 
prasami#traq martO# astuq praya#svAqnq. yasta# Adityaq SikSha#ti vraqtEna# | 
na ha#nyatEq na jI#yatEq tvOtOq nainaqma(gm)hO# aSnOqtyanti#tOq na dUqrAt || 
ya- [  ]   45
